website_summaries.verdict: Though this model has some reported concerns, it's still a popular calculator that's built to last and perform.
pros: Another top performer known for its reliability at solving tough calculations
It offers ample storage for apps/data and sharp screen images
cons: Build feels less rugged than other models

customer_reviews.title: NOT A NEW PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed with how this arrived. I've been really looking forward to using this calculator, but I'm gonna be returning it. It came with multiple scratches (they're not that noticeable at first but you could definitely see it there) all over the calculator like described in other reviews. I also have to pay for the return shipping fee on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I had a TI-84 in college. It was great. I ordered this calculator for my daughter for school and it arrived a day later than promised. When it was turned on the screen was white and blank. Thinking it needed to charge, I charged it for 24 hours. It is still white and blank. When it is plugged into the computer, it says that the OS is missing. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered new. Got used.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a new calculator. Paid full price for a NEW calculator. I received a used one. Obviously it’s been used. Ram is cleared scratches are apparent and there are some nicks like it’s been dropped a few times. Absolutely ridiculous .
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great Graphing Calculator for Middle School through College
customer_reviews.text: AP/SAT/ACT approved graphing calculator. Both my daughters used this model throughout high school and into college. We bought a new one for my youngest to get the latest features but her five year old calculator is still going strong. Color graphing is worth the extra cost. The battery is replaceable and lasts 4-5 years and is not super expensive. Figure the cost per year and then invest in your child's education!
customer_reviews.author: Miz Eliz

customer_reviews.title: It came scratched
customer_reviews.text: As soon as i got it out of the packaging I noticed a somewhat decent scratch on the screen. Its not so bad that it makes the calculator unusable but it is very frustrating. Its pretty annoying to buy something and it come with bumps and bruises.
customer_reviews.author: Wil Rozelle

customer_reviews.title: Good grades and a happy teenager.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this calculator for my daughter. Works great and I have heard no complaints. I didn’t use it myself so I can’t tell you much more, other then her grades are good and she is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable, stopped working after few months.
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after a few months of very light use. When I try to turn it on, the screen comes on and off, sometimes it's all white, sometimes it's all black, and then in between it would start working for like a minute and then go black again. The plastic used for the body is nice though, good quality plastic, bad quality electronics.
customer_reviews.author: RetroVision

customer_reviews.title: A  display  that’s very easy to see!
customer_reviews.text: I teach math classes for a local community college and I have been using the more traditional TI 84 and was envious of the students who had calculators with backlighting and also more memory. The reason I got this color is because it stands out and I rather doubt there will be another one in the classroom. There are often at least two that are blue and two that are pink etc. I would be surprised if there are two that are rose gold. I also appreciate the connectivity with the computer. There are other features that I have not gotten into but I will soon.
customer_reviews.author: cgprnd

customer_reviews.title: Dead battery, does not charge
customer_reviews.text: After the trouble with the order was fixed (product never delivered, although told it had been delivered days earlier), we have had this calculator for a little more than a month. It worked fine and charged fine for a few weeks. Suddenly, it no longer charges. We charged the calculator for 48 hours continuously. It is STILL not charged. And the second the charger is unplugged, the charged icon at the top right goes half way done. It is now a few weeks out of the 1 month return time period, so we are stuck with a lemon. Do not buy. An expensive paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Maria K.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality! Doesn’t charge
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 5 months. Won’t recharge, nothing works. Only used it for school. Didn’t even last a school year!!! Bad quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jsp

customer_reviews.title: Painful Experience!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered the Pink Graphing Calculator twice now. Instead of receiving the pink calculator I received the coral color. Not to mention it took a week to arrive. Unfortunately, I had to order it again and to my surprise I received the coral color once again. The packaging of my second purchase was terrible. It was ripped up and my heavy shampoo I purchased was right on top of it. It had no type of protection what so ever. At this point, I’m starting to think they don’t have the pink at all. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Math it U
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and does math well. As soon as you pick up this product you will be at the head of your class so matter the subject. Math=Calculator, Science=Calculator, English=Calculator for heavens sakes even in gym if you whip this thing out and start mathing it up your peers and teachers will be so impressed that you will never get that super wedgie again along with a perfect A+ keeping your GPA at the best it can be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unjustified, ridiculous pricing. TI owns this market unfortunately for the consumer.
customer_reviews.text: Required purchase for kids algebra class. As others have said, the TI graphing function is basically the standard for math teachers. Not a whole lot has changed over the years...save for improved graphics and features most kids never use. I like the comparison others have made to the cost of other computing devices and their capabilities compared to this and it’s features and functions. $120+ to do graphing on basically a calculator?!!! It’s the only thing most purchasers will ever use it for. Totally had to bite the bullet and purchase this thing. Not sure how this unfair situation evolved unchecked, but it sucks and I think TI does too!
customer_reviews.author: MCRinOC

customer_reviews.title: I was sent a used calculator!
customer_reviews.text: Bought my calculator some weeks back knowing that I'd be taking a math class come this August. So, here I am opening my calculator for the first time for Math class and notice there's scuff marks and scratches on the front and back of it and the screen says RAM Cleared. This calculator is supposed to be brand new, but yet I was sent a used one. This product was falsely advertised and it's a scam because the seller won't allow for a return once opened. The calculator clearly could not be fully inspected while packaged. I will be reaching out to Amazon about this seller. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At this price and with so little use, they should last longer than a couple years
customer_reviews.text: Have bought two of these for our kids, both of which conked out after a couple years. We now have to buy yet another. (We'd have to buy a 4th, but my daughter is able to use a friend's for her final semester of math. At this ridiculous price, we shouldn't have to replace them every couple years. Neither of our kids majors in math, so it's not as if they use them constantly. The problem is exacerbated by teachers who insist on using this brand, when there are others that are much, much less expensive and have better reviews.
customer_reviews.author: brondyblue

customer_reviews.title: The best calculator
customer_reviews.text: The best calculator ever. My daughter needed it for school and while it's a huge investment, it was a great one. It graphs in color and even has a periodic table. Every high school student needs this calculator. The only problem is learning all the features. It really is complicated, but students and teachers show each other how to use certain features. Texas Instruments has been around for so long and this proves why they are the best at calculator manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Maintenance Mgr

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this earlier
customer_reviews.text: Need this for my stats class but I never got the one Amazon sent so bought another at Target. Love the easy to read bright and colored screen. The rechargeable battery lasts about a month for my usage. There’s a huge learning curve for me, not a math person. But since it’s a TI, I received lots of help from the professor and classmates who were familiar with the UI and all the vids online. For those going on to higher maths, you can download new functions. Save a bunch of time by dl data sets so I don’t have to type in all the numbers.
customer_reviews.author: HadesTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my Son
customer_reviews.text: I bought this calculator for my son. It was a requirement that he had a calculator that had higher functions than a standard calculator. I can only assume it is easy to use, he gets his homework done and doesn't complain that is too hard to use. In my opinion, they are a bit pricey but it was required for school. What are you gonna do...
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Mayer

customer_reviews.title: This calculator is the best graphing calculator!
customer_reviews.text: Great screen quality. Graphs are in colors and the display is very clear. The screen is like a screen of a good cell phone. The way to enter a math problem is different from the TI 89. The way the output is displayed is also different from Ti 89. In general, for me, learning TI 89 was easier than the TI 84 plus CE. But I prefer the 84 plus CE because of its great screen display and the fact that graphs can be displayed on a PC and copied to a document.. The TI 84 is, without a doubt, the best graphing calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Java Student

customer_reviews.title: This Calculator Does Wonders!!!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This calculator is the key to do well in school. I've added notes to this calculator for references during exams. This is not cheating but more like using your resources to your full potential. I even downloaded pac-man and other fun games on here. Once the señoritas see you playing games on a calculator, they'll definitely give you their ten digit number. I've had as many as 20 give me theirs in a single day! Heck, I had one señorita offer me a one night stand, but I kindly declined since I originally asked her to read the bible with me. Overall, a great graphing calculator!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Wonder

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This calculator was supposed to be brand new, it is all beat up with no instructions! Absolutely not what I was expecting at all, it’s garbage! The prior owner didn’t even reset the calculator to factory settings and with instructions it may be difficult to use. WASTE OF MY TIME AND MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Niemi

customer_reviews.title: Love it 😍😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: This is the best calculator ever, dude!!! I’m taking college algebra and I would be lost without it. I’m getting a Bachelors is Nursing so this will be great in my Bio and Statistics courses. Love the pink and the color screen. I seen some people had a bad experience, I bought the one from Amazon for $149. Never opened no scratches. My only issue was it was totally dead and I had to change it first. No big deal. It is a great investment. If you’re in high school or college get it now.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Too old for this
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say it has been 2 weeks now and I am still trying to learn how to use this thing. It does amazing things and can do practically any equation you want or need. The learning curve on this was worse than when I was 5 and trying to learn how to use our ms-dos Tandy 1000 computer. Is it worth the money yes because working the problems takes 25 hours (let’s face it who actually does algebra, trig, graphs, statistics and etc. when you are not in school.)
customer_reviews.author: Princessjenny

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and order directly from Amazon or Texas Instruments
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this from Electronic Finds as a new item. What arrived was a refurbished items. It came in no box, had scratches on the screen, and even had a sticky film on the screen from when they removed the a screen protector that use to be on it. The thing is, this wouldn't have bothered me if it was advertised as refurbished and the price wasn't the same as a new item. You should be fine if you order this item directly from Amazon or even Texas Instruments.
customer_reviews.author: Justin T. Eilar

customer_reviews.title: TI- what more can I say?  LOL
customer_reviews.text: It has all the bells and whistles I needed but, this joker takes a book to figure out how to work it! Literally!!! I wish these things were friendlier but, I can manage. It's a nice calculator- nice colors and made well. I do wish it was more PC based and easier to use but, I'm not sure what I'm even asking for. I wish it had a feature where you could type in your problem and it would identify the problem and solve it. I'd pay hundreds for that feature! LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best calculator out there
customer_reviews.text: I teach college math, I have 2 kids in college, both STEM majors, and this is simply the best calculator. Buy it for your kids when they get to either trigonometry or precalculus, and it's the only calculator they'll ever need. It's perfect for statistics and probability, too.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: 6 months later and It no longer works
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed that this calculator is no longer working after only 6 months. We purchased this new and at this ridiculous price, this thing should still be working 15 years from now. Shameful.
customer_reviews.author: Ela

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to the OS update...
customer_reviews.text: This unit met and, for the most part, surpassed my expectations. I was also impressed when I filed a bug report (there are some conditions in which a calculation chain will return a mathematically impossible result) and got a response within a couple of hours. It did take a couple of days to convince the agent that I knew what I was talking about (I've written commercial floating point libraries to run automobile engines), but they are now supposedly working on the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rathbun

customer_reviews.title: A really great calculator!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a present for my child at the start of his high school honors math class. After "taking it for a spin", I am confident this calculator will last him through his senior math classes and all college level math classes. Super excited. I love the color screen. I used a TI-83 in school and I still own it. The difference colored graphs makes is huge. Easier to track each equation if you have multiple graphs running at the same time. This will be a calculator he will pass on to his children.
customer_reviews.author: Just call me "Steve"

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Calculator for All Math Students
customer_reviews.text: I got this calculator so I could better help my students (I also have a TI-nspire which is fabulous but they usually don't). This particular model has a color screen and an easier interface than the black and white TI-84s and TI-83s. If you need a graphing calculator for class I strongly recommend this one. If you are only taking a single math class (business math, algebra, statistics) the learning curve on this calculator is much easier and worth the extra money. If you are going all the way into higher math, science and engineering this calculator will go the distance.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen gatliffe

customer_reviews.title: TI-84
customer_reviews.text: This product is great!! BUT guess what!! There’s something very important you have to know, the calculator comes with about half of charge straight out of the package and if you follow the instructions it tells you to put it to charge right away, or at least that is (Recommended) so guess what!! it took HOURS to get to 100% even though the Calculator was half charged!!! LOL, so please don’t freak out!! Wait until the confirmation light comes on!! Your calculator is not defective. Be Patient
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: he has said the graphing function and the fact that he can actually have it with different colors makes it easy for him to actually get all of the calculations ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son since he'll need nearly all of the math and science classes as he pursues his degree in Forensic Science. Tried some different functions on it, and while it is more complicated than anything *I* personally need, he has said the graphing function and the fact that he can actually have it with different colors makes it easy for him to actually get all of the calculations done. Personally, as a soft-science major, my comment was it looked like the controls for an airplane, but for those that are hard science people that are required to take advanced math and science classes, this is definitely a great tool to have at your disposal!
customer_reviews.author: L. Vann

customer_reviews.title: Glad I went with this one...
customer_reviews.text: I've never needed to purchase an expensive calculator, so I was very reluctant and nervous when my son assured me this is the one that would be the best investment - not only for the Geometry class he was going to be taking, but down the road for his calculus classes, AP classes, etc. He has used it and has never regretted it or said anything about it. It has served all the functions he needed and more.
customer_reviews.author: Deron

customer_reviews.title: Required for my 8th grader's math courses
customer_reviews.text: School specified this calculator, so I bought it for her. It is not for the casual user, has MANY functions and needs to be learned. But looks comprehensively useful from junior high through college if cared for. A far cry from my freshman year in college (1973) with one of the very first, thick, holsterable $300 calculators whose functions now can be found on a light powered, credit card sized device costing $2 if that.
customer_reviews.author: RBY

customer_reviews.title: Product box damaged this was a gift see pics
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in box with damaged and opened in back. Quality control did NOT care to send me a new product. Extremely disappointed;( birthday gift to my son and it looks like it was shipped to me being dragged in the dirt.
customer_reviews.author: TheBall

customer_reviews.title: Nonfunctional
customer_reviews.text: Arrived non-functional despite intact packaging. Great work Texas Instruments, my sole purchase from you arrived inoperable.
customer_reviews.author: KDUB

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: No one wants to pay this amount for a calculator period but when your child has to have one for ACT testing and her high school math classes you suck it up and pay it. As for this new rechargeable battery it works great makes the device super light in comparison to the battery powered. The color screen makes using and reading it much more user friendly. If I have to pay a lot of money for this type I’d definitely go with this one. Software is upgradeable making it better for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Harp

customer_reviews.title: Just buy this one to start with!
customer_reviews.text: Great calculator, and the color big improvement over my previous graphing calculator. Battery lasts a long time too. There is so much functionality with this device—and more than one way to accomplish tasks—so you need to put in some effort to learn how to use it. The documentation that comes with this calculator is a tiny pamphlet, that's it! Go to the internet and watch videos, buy a cheat sheet or even a book, peek over in class and watch how other people use the calculator, etc.
customer_reviews.author: LegoGirl

customer_reviews.title: It does everything but it came with small scratches :/
customer_reviews.text: It works, it has every button in place lol and so far it does what it's supposed to do. It comes with the cables (charger) and another cable (don't really know what it's for) :/ the calculator does show a bit of wear. I'm assuming it's because it's been in the box for quite a while and also it has space in the box to move around and therefor it gets scratches? I don't know, just my assumption. It does have small like scratches between the buttons. It's weird, looks like small cat hairs but it's small thin lines/scratches. (I bought the pink model). *i have attached pictures to show the model and the scratches I'm talking about* :)
customer_reviews.author: Kary

customer_reviews.title: Top quality calculator!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my math classes at school. I was told that it was one of the top best quality calculators and they weren’t wrong. I really love the screen and how thin and compact it is. It is very light weight and can do a lot of functions. The only thing is, is that it’s very difficult to learn and memorize all the functions. Luckily they do give you a manual but it will take some time. Overall, I love my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! This is the #1 calculator recommended for high school and is allowed on PSAT/SATs.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just started high school and this is the calculator that was recommended for her. We have used TI calculators for years and this one is fantastic! It comes with a hard case around it which does offer protection against breakage, although we also ordered a separate carrying case for her to carry it and the charging cord. It offers all the functionality she will need and it is approved for use on the PSAT/SAT. We are hopeful this will be the only calculator she will need in high school and given our previous experience with TI calculators we know it will last! I still have my TI calculator from the 1980s and it still works great! :)
customer_reviews.author: L. STEVENS

customer_reviews.title: The perfect calculator for my kids needs
customer_reviews.text: This is the Calculator that my daughters teacher require them to have and it is exactly as advertised. Functionality is great on this the screen is Kristen clear and the fact that they have a multitude of colors to choose from enables her to instantly know where her calculator is in her back and not confuse it with other kids in the class.
customer_reviews.author: Felice Navidad

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate Calculator
customer_reviews.text: Seriously this thing does almost anything in math you would ever need (except complex algebra with variables -- buy Nspire CAS for this). Battery can last up to 4 weeks with conservative use, then can easily charge back up in a few hours. Color display makes graphs easy to read and is easier to see in bright daylight. There are also hundreds of programs for download on various websites that further expand the features of this thing for the SAT and other math subjects. You can even play games!
customer_reviews.author: zach8870

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Had this Calculator When I was a Kid
customer_reviews.text: Perfect calculator for Algebra and Geometry. This is the second one we have purchased, one for each kid. Both kids love that it graphs in color, making it easier to distinguish lines. The data that is stored on the calculator can easily be stored on a computer and wiped clean for test taking, then put back on the calculator. I have no doubt this calculator will take my kids through college.
customer_reviews.author: Alix H

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Semester!
customer_reviews.text: My TI-83 Plus finally died this year. As a college student, I needed a new calculator quickly. This one arrived on time with no damages! Everything on it works well, plus the color is beautiful. I am so happy with this calculator. It does everything I need it to. Anyone taking upper level math classes, this is the calculator for you.
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Fast, good display
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my daughter's TI-83 that got left on an airplane when we traveled the week before finals. She loves this new model, saying that it graphs faster and the screen makes the graphs easier to read. Her artist friend custom painted the cover so her calculator won't be easily confused with all the others in class.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. McCarty

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting more for the price
customer_reviews.text: First; I found it cheaper on EBay by 22%. Secondly; the white background on the keys does not help in focusing on what keys you need to use when you are rushing through it. Additionally; I have chosen the gold color simply because it was then cheaper than other colors but I do highly recommend buying a cover for it; especially if you are planning on selling it afterwards; you should keep it in good condition so you are able to get some decent reselling value for it. No other options available on Amazon to replace Ti 84 plus C; so you are forced to buy this model.
customer_reviews.author: outraged

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the one I used in school!
customer_reviews.text: My son needed this calculator for his Algebra 2 class this year and I was expecting it to be the same one I used 20 years ago. What a pleasant surprise to find how much they've upgraded the screen! Way better than the blocky one I used to use! The rechargable batteries are awesome too - no more carrying extra batteries to tests "just in case". My son is so enamored with it that he's been learning how to code games into his calculator!
customer_reviews.author: KnitGirl

customer_reviews.title: No signs of prior use
customer_reviews.text: I got really nervous reading the reviews. I am happy to say mine came in unopened with no sign of use what so ever. It’s a beautiful calculator. Also came in much earlier than expected. So very Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Fia

customer_reviews.title: Powerful calculator with all kinds of functionality.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my grandson's ninth grade algebra class at the insistence of his teacher. It is a great calculator with all kinds of functionality. This is a device that will serve him well throughout high school and college and depending on his career choices perhaps his career. I feel it was a good investment for his future.
customer_reviews.author: Pappy Steve

customer_reviews.title: The calculator to have.
customer_reviews.text: This is THE calculator my daughter’s high school teacher recommended, she is in algebra 2. It’s expensive but should last her all high school into her more advanced math and physics. The teacher has a few extras to loan students and the library has a few for students who can’t afford them. For anyone that has an extra sitting around please donate it to your local high school!
customer_reviews.author: J-Rock

customer_reviews.title: This Isn't Your Father's Calculator
customer_reviews.text: We bought this per a HS teacher's recommendation. I am looking forward to the long battery life and rechargeable batteries. The screen isn't a Super AMOLED, but wasn't expecting that for a calculator. It does what it needs to...fast, and has many apps from TI as well as a community of fans to use for education, productivity, and entertainment (as much as a calculator can provide entertainment).
customer_reviews.author: KIND

customer_reviews.title: Screen already bad.
customer_reviews.text: Less than two months and my screen now has a line on it. I use this to teach Algebra 1, bought this with my own $$ as a teacher to have a device to use in class. Really frustrated spent $160 to not work 2 months later without ever dropping it or anything!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Ogroske

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - delivery time and packaging - is it new??
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product. 2 stars for 1 reason... well kinda.. I purchased this calculator as a gift. I ordered this product and it took almost 3 weeks to arrive. When it arrived it wasn’t even in its original packaging. I read through the description again and nowhere did it read that it was used or refurbished ... however, that certainly appears to be the situation. I spent $120 on a calculator that even if it isn’t, I have to give what looks like a used item ... disappointed
customer_reviews.author: jaksmom

customer_reviews.title: Really impressive calculator
customer_reviews.text: The display of the TI-84 plus CE is high quality and the customization is nice. Everything is straightforward and works well. I have a math class 5 days a week, and the battery has lasted me about a month. My old TI-36X pro is still my favorite calculator ever, despite the fact that it doesn’t graph. Things like simplifying radicals, converting decimals into fractions, and even just typing out fractions are much easier on the 36, and I find myself switching back and forth occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten L.

customer_reviews.title: Great calculator
customer_reviews.text: Daughter needed this for her precalc class, and has used it a lot so far. Pricey, but for how many functions and apps it has got, it is so worth it. It has greatly helped her in class, and will continue to do so throughout high school and maybe even college. Great investment. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Chia

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Kids
customer_reviews.text: This is the standard graphing calculator recommended by many schools and teachers. Its the one they teach how to use. Its a really nice calculator with more functions than you'll ever use and the rechargeable one lasts a long time between charges...my kids charge it every few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: bv_amazonian

customer_reviews.title: I love the color (yes trivial)
customer_reviews.text: I love the color (yes trivial), but I haven't replaced my graphing calculator in a long time, so I decided to go with the current TI-84. So far I have been extremely happy with the new functions. The color screen is great. When graphing students can identify graphs by color. There is a plate over the screen to protect it from cracking, and best of all it does not require batteries. It comes with a charger. Hooray. If you can operate older TI-84's this is no problem to use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product used in my son's school.
customer_reviews.text: Can't honestly say anything about other similar graphing calculators made by other manufactures but this one is the one my son's school issues in his higher math classes and the students seem to enjoy using it. He ordered his own to have and use as he moves on to other studies.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Top notch calculator
customer_reviews.text: I am a math teacher; I love the color version of this calculator because it allows the students to compare attributes of graphs. The charging cord is also nice because he won’t have to be changing out batteries all the time. This is a fantastic calculator and can also be used on college entrance standardized tests. TI calculators are among the best. Students can utilize this calculator from middle school through college. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S

customer_reviews.title: Good for math
customer_reviews.text: I loved this calculator! I still do! I bought it for pre-calculus and am now using it for calculus. If you are thinking of buying a graphic calculator it is worth saving up and investing your money in a calculator like this one. Though I wished I knew about other brands that’s geared towards science classes, these are perfect for your math classes. Bottom line: do your research! You can buy calculators as second hand and have them perform (I bought this one second hand) just as well and get a bang for your bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree May

customer_reviews.title: Grade calculator!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a graphing calculator for my statistics class. I like that it’s rechargeable compared to older models the required batteries, and this calculator has a battery life indicator So you know when you need to charge it. And when you do charge it the light is red for charging and green for when it’s fully charged. It does everything I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Helped my son!
customer_reviews.text: My son was having issues in Algebra because our calculator at home was an old version and slightly different. I ordered this and he’s doing much better! He struggles with Math, but being able to follow along and have the same calculator at home has definitely helped.
customer_reviews.author: UPNorthMom

customer_reviews.title: Good Calculator
customer_reviews.text: I used this for intro to statistics last quarter. It lasted well all throughout. The display is nice with a back-light that you can dim or brighten. The battery needed recharging about every other week, but it's rechargeable so that was nice. No need to buy batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix5413

customer_reviews.title: Barely used and not charging
customer_reviews.text: TI makes the best calculators but after shelling out the money even for the fancy color my son who has barely used it says it is not charging (despite the fact that he just absolutely had to have this now that he is in AP math and the big time!) Contacted the warranty and waiting to hear.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Its the standard - very powerful.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son to use at school and college. It’s awesome. I had a TI-86 over 25 years ago myself. This works just like my old one but with full color, lots of features, and of course it incredibly powerful. My son loves it. The standard for college.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Melling

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand how Texas Instruments maintains a strangle hold on academia. I get 1000 times more user friendly functions out of a web based graphing utility, like Desmos and Wolfram Alpha. Which is free. Yet, I have to pay upwards of 100 dollars for a piece of garbage that can't even have you graph inequalities and zoom out. Without jumping between 'application' and 'zoom' and multiple other options. Piece of garbage product. Bankrupt Texas Instruments.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Plastic calculator packaging was ripped up
customer_reviews.text: The product packaging was ripped to shreds and taped back again. Like someone had ripped it open while it was on a store shelf. I also had a white calculator and not a black one. In spite of the PRODUCT packaging, the calculator works great and came with everything it should have
customer_reviews.author: Lannie

customer_reviews.title: The gold standard of standard calculators.
customer_reviews.text: This deserves the widespread adoption it has enjoyed. It's well designed, easy to use, and has all the functions most students will need.. It's a Ford/Chevy/Dodge pickup truck, useful for all the typical high-school math hauling. The nSpire series, especially with CAS (algebra solving) features, is like a helicopter/lamborghini/humvee, capable of doing much more, but it's too powerful to be used on the SAT's. So enjoy the TI-84 plus CE. It's solid.
customer_reviews.author: 3foot1

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful in your calculus class
customer_reviews.text: It is bit expensive but it is very easy to use and helpful for higher math class. But just like any other device you have to keep charging. And make sure you charge fully before your exam. I wish they would have backup batteries as well. Just in case if we forget to charge
customer_reviews.author: S. Bhatt

customer_reviews.title: Good for its intended purpose if you know how to use one.
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't used a graphing calculator since I was in 9th grade then suddenly I needed one for college algebra. It's a good calculator but personally I feel like I'm going to need a class to learn the ins and outs on how to use not just this one but any graphing calculator. The one I had at back then had super Mario on it, this one I don't believe does. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: alberto m.

customer_reviews.title: A solid calculator
customer_reviews.text: If you want power, go for an nx model, and if you want 3d graphing, go for a titanium. I actually cant recommend the titanium enough, but let's be honest, if you're here, probably all you are looking for is some calculator clout, and this delivers big time. Walking into class, you see the peasants on their Ti-83s and 84s, but you now have the power of a God. This calculator is BIG TIME GOOD. Buy it! I can't tell you enough, unless you're taking some sort of advanced calc, this calculator is perfect! Buy it in the seventh grade and keep it until your senior year. Trust me, this calculator delivers on ALL levels!
customer_reviews.author: SoyBoy Joe

customer_reviews.title: Just What the Professor Ordered
customer_reviews.text: Bought this calculator for school. Has a very impressive battery life. I used it for one semester, skipped math the next semester. Even after about 18 weeks of no use (not plugged in), it had plenty of charge. I bought the mint green. I like the idea that I can identify my calulator easily if I let someone borrow it, or if it would happen to get mixed up with someone else’s. The colors are bold and easy to read. The calulator is not difficult to learn to use or operate, but if you are not used to doing Trigonometry or Calculus, or using fancy calculators, it does take some time, patience and practice to use.
customer_reviews.author: ladebug

customer_reviews.title: One of the best brands out there
customer_reviews.text: Yes these calculators are ridiculously expensive but still so worth it and one of the best out there. This thing pretty much does it all including playing games, adding apps, a colored graphing screen and so much more. Very happy with our purchase, price and all.
customer_reviews.author: kindlemom1 (My Guilty Obsession Blog)

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn and use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this calculator for my son to use in his Algebra 2 class. It is easy to learn and use, substantial without being too large or heavy, and is durable. I'm hoping that it stands up to the remaining high school years and on to college as well.
customer_reviews.author: J.O.

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished calculator
customer_reviews.text: The calculator does what it's supposed to; it's fully functioning and easy to use. The only issue I had was that there were multiple scratches (or slight cracks??) on it despite it just coming out of packaging, and it said RAM cleared when I first opened it with batteries nearly dead. I paid full price for a new one, and I'd obviously expect an entirely new calculator. Honestly kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy from Seller
customer_reviews.text: It may seem like it is brand new since it’s in its packaging but once you take the calculator out, there’s scratches all over as if it has been used and recycled. I did not pay that much money to open something that seems like it has been used before.
customer_reviews.author: Angeline Aquino

customer_reviews.title: you may not like math, but you will sure like this to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those things you have to have for class, you may not like math, but you will sure like this to help you through it!!! the graphing and plus features are well worth it. Don't forget to put you name in it. The only improvement I would recommend to Texas Instruments is to put a password feature in the programming, so when you turn it on, only the owner can open it to use. This could prevent others from stealing it, since it would stay locked if you didn't know the password.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Graphing Calculator for High School
customer_reviews.text: My daughter will be using this graphing calculator for her high school class. It arrived today in great condition, and the packaging includes the wall charger and two different charging cables. One cable can be used to charge the calculator from your computer, and the other is a normal charging cable. The package came with two user manuals, and I recommend this calculator for anyone in a math or science-based high school class.
customer_reviews.author: NightOwl23

customer_reviews.title: It shorted out after one year
customer_reviews.text: It died 1 in one year with real good care taken of it.
customer_reviews.author: MSS

customer_reviews.title: it is overall a solid device- good battery and hardware that has not failed or arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much to be said when reviewing anything such as a calculator. What I had received had no dead or discolored pixels, and I can only hope has not produced erratic solutions in the equations thrown at it. I have not used this thing very regularly, but after fully charging I can keep it off the plug for more than a month without worrying about charge level. So, it is overall a solid device- good battery and hardware that has not failed or arrived DOA.
customer_reviews.author: A dragon

customer_reviews.title: WTF
customer_reviews.text: So oddly enough I forgot that these calculators need to be charged so I finally go to charge it and I don’t have a any usb cables at all. What was the point of me paying for it if I cant charge it
customer_reviews.author: L***

customer_reviews.title: Essential Calculator
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well-designed and essential product for higher level math classes. I find that it is very easy to use once you get the base idea of it and, even after several years of using it, I'm still finding out it does some things that I never knew it did before. I would definitely recommend buying the TI-84 Plus CE before a TI-83 Plus. I used to have a TI-83 Plus and recently upgraded to this, and I find that the display on the TI-84 Plus CE not only looks better, but actually helps when calculating various things.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: calculator
customer_reviews.text: This calculator is likely the best calculator I have ever owned, from the quality of the product related to the build and also the features. I'll probably buy another as a spare in case this item stops production for some unknown reason.
customer_reviews.author: JoeAverage-User

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my son in High School
customer_reviews.text: The school recommends this model. My oldest has the earlier model and still uses in college for engineering. My younger son needed it for High School as he is prepping for engineering as well. Good price since I shopped around for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gough

customer_reviews.title: Great calculator and a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this calculator. Its multifunctional and a great upgrade from my previous Ti 83 plus that was just a monochrome calculator with less abilities. This simply is too advance for current calculators and now has a LCD screen. Also it lasts weeks if you use it for just a specific class. And if you know how to install applications and some games, makes this calculator even better. I personally used this calculator in Statistics, math classes, and science classes. Worth the investment since they are also durable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Y.

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived on time and was well packaged. ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and was well packaged. This is similarly priced to the the TI Nspire and more expensive than comparable Casio models. We ordered this because our high school students math curriculum is based on using the TI 84 line of calculators. The TI Nspire is more capable and possibly future proof and the Casio is more economical, but if your student can't follow along with the class they are worthless. Although this works very well and is a defiinite upgrade from the the TI 84. So for high schoolers, go with the teacher recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: IF-U-SAY-SO

customer_reviews.title: Return policy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this calculator for a statistics class that I already had several calculators for but not this specific one. My class ended and I didn’t need to even open the box, I thought, wonderful, but then looked and they had closed the window of returns. I see not being able to return after a year but these calculators have stayed the same throughout and there is no reason I shouldn’t be allowed to return it after the quarter if I needed to. So now I’m out 130$ and have a unopened calculator that will never be used.
customer_reviews.author: jeremiah g porter

customer_reviews.title: I love this calculator!!
customer_reviews.text: This calculator is by far one of the best calculators I have ever bought throughout my time in school. It is quick, with a long battery life, and great screen quality. The only part I would like additionally to be included is some sort of case or protective cover as the calculator tends to get dirty easily. Another additional tip is to include a manual of all the functions and keys as it is hard to learn all of them easily. This calculator can also download games!! :) Overall I think it's an amazing calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Tushar Sukale

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it for college for statistics class, and it’s super helpful. He’s extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Van Meter

customer_reviews.title: Nice Calculator
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son to use in high school. It's a nice graphing calculator, it holds a charge well and seems to be easy to use. We purchased a case to keep it in this way it will last longer than if my son just tossed it in his backpack.
customer_reviews.author: chaserx

customer_reviews.title: Practically perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: Awesome calculator. Graphs, solves equations, downloadable programs. TI got this right. I like the color because I like the color, BUT it has an additional benefit. As I get older it is harder for me to see the functions activated by the “2nd” key. With a color other than a black case, these keys become easier for me to read. If your class calls for a TI 83 or 84.....go right to the TI 84 Plus CE.
customer_reviews.author: tleeminnieme

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted two years
customer_reviews.text: It broke after only 2 years of use. I did nothing that would cause it to break. I left it in my desk for a month and now if just won’t work, the only button that will work is the ON button. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jon wodzisz

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to get a separate instruction manual!!
customer_reviews.text: Works so well--I ordered in mint green and the color was lovely. Best part: I can use it on the ACT and SAT! Perfect and just what I needed. Be sure to order some way to learn all the special features. Without my separately purchased instruction manual I wouldn't have known how to use any of the advanced features (it's pretty confusing at first, but once you get the hang of it you can speed through the functions).
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Probst

customer_reviews.title: Good calculator but scratches
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as expected. I knew Texas instrument was a good brand prior, as I had a normal Ti-84 before. I was; however, disappointed that there were tiny little scratches between the buttons and some scratches as the top corner of my calculator. I got the packaging undamaged and in pristine condition, so I can only assume that it was scratched during manufacturing. Other than that, the calculator was just what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jialin

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this calculator is priced this much is because of the monopoly. With this amount, people can easily build a Pi computer which is way powerful than the calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Floria Tanith

customer_reviews.title: Great calculator!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my calculator and hate math! Easy to use, is very necessary in advanced math courses. Same interface/layout as older TI-84 models, just slimmer, doesn’t need batteries (it holds charge for a very long time and then charges extremely fast with the cord), and has a fun color display! Love making my graphs rainbow colors, it keeps math more entertaining. Acceptable calculator for standardized tests (SAT, ACT, AP, etc.) My calculator also gets many compliments because the color is just gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.author: tw

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This calculator was advertised as a product that was packaged in original packaging and it is not original it is a used product. I was really disappointed when I received and envelope with a calculator that had a missing cover and they scratched up screen.
customer_reviews.author: Natassha Diaz

customer_reviews.title: good, but build quality is less
customer_reviews.text: The look is good and it performs as expected. The build quality is significantly lower than the previous TI-84s. The cost his higher but it feels like they went to a cheaper thinner plastic. It's cool to have color graphs but I am not sure that the extra money is worth what you actually get.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good for you stats class
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my math classes when I was a math major. They look and feel nice and there's a lot to learn from these, but I wouldn't recommend anyone purchasing these if you will just take 1 math class during your 4 years of college; just rent one in your college with your ID.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbert Alvarado

product_meta.title: Texas Instruments TI-84 Plus CE Color Graphing Calculator, Bionic Blue
product_meta.description: Color:Blue| Style:Single PackThe TI-84 Plus CE makes comprehension of math and science topics quicker and easier. Ideal for middle school through college.
feature_bullets: Available in a variety of fun colors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars7,743 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
